name: deepfamily
description: DeepFamily - Decentralized Digital Family Tree Protocol

scripts.test:gas: node -e "console.error('test:gas is not available after Hardhat 3 migration (hardhat-gas-reporter is Hardhat 2-only).'); process.exit(1)"
scripts.test:coverage: node -e "console.error('test:coverage is not available after Hardhat 3 migration (solidity-coverage is Hardhat 2-only).'); process.exit(1)"
scripts.size: node -e "console.error('size is not available after Hardhat 3 migration (hardhat-contract-sizer is Hardhat 2-only).'); process.exit(1)"
scripts.dev:contract: npm run dev:deploy && npm run seed
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k -n node,web -c blue,green "npm run dev:node" "wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8545 && npm run dev:contract && npm run frontend:config && npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.seed: cross-env hardhat --config hardhat.config.mjs run scripts/seed-historical.mjs --network localhost
scripts.zk:fetch: bash -lc 'set -e; mkdir -p bin; curl -sSL -o bin/circom https://github.com/iden3/circom/releases/download/v2.1.6/circom-linux-amd64 && chmod +x bin/circom && bin/circom --version'
scripts.zk:build:person: bash -lc 'set -e; mkdir -p artifacts/circuits && bin/circom circuits/person_hash_zk.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -l node_modules -l node_modules/circomlib/circuits -o artifacts/circuits'
scripts.zk:build:name: bash -lc 'set -e; mkdir -p artifacts/circuits && bin/circom circuits/name_poseidon_zk.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -l node_modules -l node_modules/circomlib/circuits -o artifacts/circuits'
scripts.zk:build: npm run zk:build:person && npm run zk:build:name
scripts.zk:ptau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 13 tmp/pot13_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute tmp/pot13_0000.ptau tmp/pot13_0001.ptau --name="init" -v -e="entropy1" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 tmp/pot13_0001.ptau tmp/pot13_final.ptau -v
scripts.zk:setup:person: snarkjs groth16 setup artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk.r1cs tmp/pot13_final.ptau artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_0000.zkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey --name="1st" -v -e="entropy2" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk.vkey.json
scripts.zk:setup:name: snarkjs groth16 setup artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk.r1cs tmp/pot13_final.ptau artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_0000.zkey artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_final.zkey --name="1st" -v -e="entropy2" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_final.zkey artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk.vkey.json
scripts.zk:setup: npm run zk:setup:person && npm run zk:setup:name
scripts.zk:check:name: node tasks/zk-name-poseidon-check.mjs --wasm ./artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_js/name_poseidon_zk.wasm --zkey ./artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_final.zkey --input ./circuits/test/proof/name_poseidon_input.json
scripts.zk:check: npm run zk:check:person && npm run zk:check:name
scripts.zk:export: snarkjs wtns export json circuits/test/witness.wtns circuits/test/public.json
scripts.zk:prove: snarkjs groth16 fullprove circuits/test/fullname_hash_input.json artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_js/person_hash_zk.wasm artifacts/circuits/person_hash_zk_final.zkey tmp/proof.json tmp/public.json
scripts.zk:verifier:name: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier artifacts/circuits/name_poseidon_zk_final.zkey contracts/NamePoseidonVerifier.sol
scripts.zk:verifier: npm run zk:verifier:person && npm run zk:verifier:name

author: DeepFamily Team
